title: Microsoftâ€™s One Outlook email client for Windows leaks
content:
Microsoft’s web-based One Outlook client, which has been rumored for over a year, has leaked online, and it’s actually allowing some users to try it out now. The app has been known to be in the works for a while now, and while the client itself has been available in the past, only internal Microsoft

The post Microsoft’s One Outlook email client for Windows leaks appeared first on XDA.
description: Mirosoft has been working on a web-based Outlook app for a while, but now you can try it - as long as you have a work or school account.
